Text:
Super1313

Why not install KMEAW 3.55 CFW?

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6205397/_Custom_Firmware_Kmeaw_3.55__w_MultiMan_1.16.03

You will get the best compatibility.. 3.41 is outdated.
beacause it took me 2 years to collect over 300 games, I dont want to redo all of them

You don't need to redo a single game.. 

3.55 will play any game that works on 3.41 or lower.

I was on 3.41 with my dongle, installed 3.55 and every game that worked before still works, plus all the new ones.
You dont have to go back through and replace all the eboot fixes from 3.41 to 3.55?

super

no, i can promise you that every eboot that runs on 3.41 will also run on 3.55
